title: Citi Plans Further Expansion of Successful Global "Asian Desk" Strategy
summary: Citi, Asia's leading global bank for institutional and retail clients, plans to open six more Asian desks in the next 12 months to serve Asian corporate clients across the world. The desks will complement the 13 already opened by the bank that are servicing Asia's leading corporate clients.
tag-1: Citi Plans Further Expansion of Successful Global "Asian Desk" Strategy
tag-3: Citi, Asia's leading global bank for institutional and retail clients, plans to open six more Asian desks in the next 12 months to serve Asian corporate clients across the world. The desks will complement the 13 already opened by the bank that are servicing Asia's leading corporate clients.
tag-4: The new desks to be opened include four China desks – in Africa, Latin America, Russia and South East Asia, and two Korean desks – in South East Asia and Latin America. The desks will support Citi's Chinese and Korean multi-national clients across corporate banking, investment banking, local debt raising, foreign exchange, cash management and trade finance.
tag-5: From these desks Citi serves leading Chinese and Korean companies, working closely with the local country teams in Citi's network of more than 100 countries. Clients covered include companies such as Samsung and Lenovo, which are banked by Citi in more than 60 countries.
tag-6: The desks will be staffed by a combination of local employees and senior staff from China and Korea with existing relationships with key clients.
tag-7: "Our clients are increasingly growing globally, and our priority is to ensure they are using Citi's global network and local knowledge as they expand and transact business across the world said," Farhan Faruqui, Head of Corporate and Investment Banking for Asia Pacific. "The desk strategy has been successful in deepening the relationships with Asian multi-national clients, and this expansion underlines our commitment to serve our clients further."
tag-8: Citi currently has seven China desks and six Korean desks. The China desks are in London, New York, Algiers, Dubai, Johannesburg, Singapore and Hong Kong. The Korea desks are in New York, Bratislava, Moscow, Beijing, Chennai and Shanghai.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
